channel.title: Comments on: jt songs – The Good Irish Doctor and a Story for Smiling.

item.title: By: jhdanieltakethat
item.dc:creator: jhdanieltakethat
item.description: Craig, Not only am I gonna support the Tully folks, but I am also going to eat some crab legs soon. PBR will quite possibly be involved. Your picturesque blog made me realize that life is short. I must eat, drink and listen well. Bravo!
item.content:encoded: Craig, Not only am I gonna support the Tully folks, but I am also going to eat some crab legs soon. PBR will quite possibly be involved. Your picturesque blog made me realize that life is short. I must eat, drink and listen well. Bravo!
